wmisc 0.2.18

    primp

    primp.Rd

    Get styled console text output

    primp(x, cat = TRUE)

    Arguments

    x

    A text containing possible styles in curly brackets, separated by comma, semicolon or space.

    cat

    TRUE or FALSE

    Value

    Cat a string or returns string

    Details

    Possible styles are: "bold", "faint", "italic", "underline", "swap", "strike", "black", "red", "green", "yellow", "blue", "magenta", "cyan", "white", "lightblack", "lightred", "lightgreen", "lightyellow", "lightblue", "lightmagenta", "lightcyan", "lightwhite", "bg-black", "bg-red", "bg-green", "bg-yellow", "bg-blue", "bg-magenta", "bg-cyan", "bg-white", "bg-lightblack", "bg-lightred", "bg-lightgreen", "bg-lightyellow", "bg-lightblue", "bg-lightmagenta", "bg-lightcyan", "bg-lightwhite"

    Examples

    primp("{green bold}Jo Lady, {blue,italic}that's me, {bg-red}in a tree!")
#> Jo Lady, that's me, in a tree!
